Package project

Class Market

java.lang.Object
project.Market
public class Market extends Object
The Market class represents a marketplace where items and athletes are available for purchase. It provides methods for managing the market

  • Method Details

    • itemShop

      public ArrayList<project.Item> itemShop()
      Constructs an arraylist(shopItems) of items and randomly adds 4 items to a new arraylist (selectedItems) and returns selected items
      Returns:
      selected arraylist of random items

    • playerShop

      public ArrayList<project.Athlete> playerShop(int currentWeek)
      generates a random number between 3-5 and adds that number of random athletes to the arraylist The current week to increases all athletes' statistics in the shop as the weeks increase
      Parameters:
      currentWeek - and integer value that represents the current week of the game and scale of statistic increase
      Returns:
      an array list(shop athletes) of random athletes between 3-5

    • getShopAthletes

      public ArrayList<project.Athlete> getShopAthletes()
      gets an array list of random athletes
      Returns:
      currentAthletesAvailable

    • getShopItems

      public ArrayList<project.Item> getShopItems()
      gets an array list of random items
      Returns:
      currentItemsAvailable

    • refreshMarket

      public void refreshMarket(int currentWeek)
      sets selectedItem to variable(currentItemsAvailable) and shop athletes to vairble(currentAthletesAvailable) calls itemshop and playershop for the refresh
      Parameters:
      currentWeek - and integer value that represents the current week of the game

    • purchaseAthlete

      public void purchaseAthlete(project.Athlete athlete)
      method that removes athlete form array list currentAthletesAvailable
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete that is removed from currentAthletesAvailable

    • purchaseItem

      public void purchaseItem(project.Item item)
      method that removes item from array list currentItemsAvailable
      Parameters:
      item - the item is removed item from array list currentItemsAvailable
